subject: p14387068
History: -year-old man with right-sided pleural effusion and pigtail placement has known trapped lung, suspect to see hydropneumothorax.
Findings: Comparison is made to the previous study from. There is a right-sided PICC line with distal lead tip in the mid SVC. Dobbhoff tube is seen. There is again seen hydropneumothorax in the right base. There is loculated fluid along the right apex as well as well as right-sided volume loss. A small left-sided pleural effusion is seen.
